## IJabraError interface

Describes an error that can be thrown while utilizing the Jabra SDK.

It has the usual properties of an `Error`<!-- -->, with some additional ones added.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IJabraError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [type](./jabra-js.ijabraerror.type.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [ErrorType](./jabra-js.errortype.md) | Error reason, e.g. unsupported feature. |
